custom404.title: Are you lost ?
custom404.text: This page sounds like an empty place, looks like an empty and even smells like an empty place ... this is probably an empty page.
custom404.image_alt: Picture of a man looking at a 404 sign.

home.long_description: Welcome to my blog ! I love diving into the React world and build exceptional applications. So I'm gonna wright about what I'm learning, about what interests me and, sometimes, merely about what I'm reading. It's gonna be technical, sceptical and a bit drawable.

blog.meta_description: Articles to share dev-notes, how-to tutos and about some daily thoughts.
blog.image_alt: Picture of a man coding on his computer.

meta.title: Maxime Beuil
meta.description: React enthusiast, book lover and very casual artist.
